transcripts: Do you know who sucks at pooping? You do. That's because when you sit on a porcelain throne it's muscles that kinking the hose and stops the thin and jellies from sliding out smoothly. Is that a problem? I don't know. Are hemorrhoids a problem? Sitting at this angle can cause bloating, constipation and a butt-load of other crap. That's because your bodies were made to poop in a squat and know there is a product that let's you squat in your own home. Introducing the Squatty Potty. Yes, It will give you the best poop in your life guaranteed. I don't just mean you bloated lords and hemorrhoidal ladies. Come on, get the last scoop out from the carton. With the Squatty Potty you get complete elimination. Plus when you're done it tucks neatly out of sight thanks to its innovative patented design. Truly a foot stool fit for a constipated king. Squatty Potty the stool for a better stool. Pooping will never be the same and neither will ice cream...
